      • configure

        public void configure(org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration configuration)
        Configuration method. Configuration parameters for BaseAlgorithm class are:
        • species: ISpecies (complex)

          Individual species
        • evaluator: IEvaluator (complex)

          Individuals evaluator
        • population-size: int

          Population size
        • max-of-generations: int

          Maximum number of generations
        • provider: IProvider (complex)

          Individuals provider
        • mu: int Number of parents to select
        • lambda: int Number of son to obtain by recombination
        • recombinator: IRecombinator (complex) Recombination operator
        Specified by:
        configure in interface IConfigure
        Overrides:
        configure in class PopulationAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        configuration - Configuration settings
